New Records: Felicio Milson scored a 93rd-minute goal to secure Angola's first three points in the 2025 Afcon qualifiers against Ghana
Key Match Events: Felicio Milson scored the winning goal for Angola in the 93rd minute
Abdul Mumin failed to clear a cross into the box, leading to Milson's goal
Ghana struggled to create clear chances throughout the game
Angola's substitutes combined to secure all three points for them
Pre-Game Insights: Angola coach Pedro Goncalves said his team had experience to hurt Ghana in their backyard
Post-Match Reflections: Fans booed the players after the full-time whistle
This was the first time since 6 February, 2000, that Ghana had lost a game at the Kumasi sports stadium
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sudan leads group F with three points after beating Niger
Ghana and Niger are at the bottom of the table after the first round of matches
The Black Stars will travel to play Niger in their next group game in four days
